title: #177: The Magical & Enchanted Food Forest | Jim Gale
description:
With supply chain issues bearing down on America from one direction, and price inflation hammering consumers from another, people are trying to figure out what to do if things continue to decline.

Jim Gale has an answer.

You do not need to be an actual farmer to grow your own food, and just about anyone can grow their very own food forest right in their yard. Jim explains how he got started with his company Food Forest Abundance, and why he thinks that we have a perfect opportunity to break out of our supply chains by growing our own food at home.
